overview: Aunt Lily (Katie Morgan) and her nephew by alliance Dean (Jay Romero), manipulate Cammy (Kylie Rocket), a gullible teen into losing virginity. Lily owns a beauty salon and Dean gets an appointment for her for less. Cammy is taken by this sweet offer and accepts, although she has NO IDEA what's in store for her. Lillian (Christy Love), a determined lesbian teacher, makes her teen student Codey (Codey Steele) impregnate her. Codey is shocked and tries to deny the offer but Lillian, desperate, threatens to ruin his future by sabotaging his chances of getting into college. Lillian will go to any lengths to get what she wants.
title: A New You
